verses.text: And an \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w* to \w Bochim|strong="H1066"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I made you to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* you unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*; and I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w never|strong="H5769"\w* \w break|strong="H6565"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with you.\f + \fr 2.1 \ft angel: or, messenger\f*

And ye shall \w make|strong="H3772"\w* no \w league|strong="H1285"\w* with the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; ye shall throw \w down|strong="H5422"\w* their \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*: but ye have not \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*: why have ye \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this?

Wherefore I also \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will not drive them \w out|strong="H1644"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you; but they shall be \add as thorns\add* in your \w sides|strong="H6654"\w*, and their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* shall be a \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* unto you.

And it came to pass, when the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* unto all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*.

And they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of that \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Bochim|strong="H1066"\w*: and they \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* there unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 2.5 \ft Bochim: that is, Weepers\f*

¶ And when \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* had let the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* unto his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* that \w outlived|strong="H0748"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, who had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* all the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.  +  r 2.7  t outlived: Heb. prolonged days after *

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \add being\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*.

And they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* in \w Timnath-heres|strong="H8556"\w*, in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, on the north \w side|strong="H6828"\w* of the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gaash|strong="H1608"\w*.\f + \fr 2.9 \ft Timnath-heres: also called, Timnath-serah\f*

And also all that \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* were \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* unto their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: and there \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, which \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, nor yet the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* which he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*:

And they \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, which brought them \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, of the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* them, and \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* themselves unto them, and provoked the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*.
And they \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* and \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w*.

¶ And the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w hot|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and he \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of \w spoilers|strong="H8154"\w* that \w spoiled|strong="H8155"\w* them, and he \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* them into the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, so that they \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not any \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

Whithersoever they went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was against them for \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, and as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto them: and they were \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w distressed|strong="H3334"\w*.

¶ Nevertheless the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* raised \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*, which \w delivered|strong="H3467"\w* them out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of those that \w spoiled|strong="H8154"\w* them.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft delivered: Heb. saved\f*

And yet they would not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto their \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*, but they went a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* themselves unto them: they \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4118"\w* out of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* which their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* walked \w in|strong="H1980"\w*, \w obeying|strong="H8085"\w* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \add but\add* they \w did|strong="H6213"\w* not so.

And when the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w raised|strong="H6965"\w* them up \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*, then the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was with the \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H3467"\w* them out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*: for it \w repented|strong="H5162"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of their \w groanings|strong="H5009"\w* by reason of them that \w oppressed|strong="H3905"\w* them and \w vexed|strong="H1766"\w* them.

And it came to pass, when the \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4194"\w*, \add that\add* they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w corrupted|strong="H7843"\w* \add themselves\add* more than their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, in \w following|strong="H3212"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them, and to bow \w down|strong="H7812"\w* unto them; they \w ceased|strong="H5307"\w* not from their own \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*, nor from their \w stubborn|strong="H7186"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 2.19 \ft corrupted…: or, were corrupt\f*\f + \fr 2.19 \ft ceased…: Heb. let nothing fall of their\f*

¶ And the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w hot|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Because that this \w people|strong="H1471"\w* hath \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* which I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and have not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*;

I also will not \w henceforth|strong="H3254"\w* drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* which \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* when he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*:

That through them I may \w prove|strong="H5254"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, whether they will \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* therein, as their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* did \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \add it\add*, or not.

Therefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w left|strong="H3240"\w* those \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w without|strong="H1115"\w* driving them \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w hastily|strong="H4118"\w*; neither \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* he them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*.\f + \fr 2.23 \ft left: or, suffered\f*
